title: we need to talk about 055 (comic pt 2)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

The last one seemed to get a decent amount of upvotes, so... I guess I'm continuing it? I'm gonna do three panels at a time, and once I finish the comic, I'll delete these and release one that's the full comic strung together. [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:we-need-to-talk-about-055-comic-part-1 |Here's the Pt 1]]], if you're interested. Again - credits to [[*user qntm]]!
